It's a matter of belief woah there guy. This post was asking about what steps different moms were taking after vaccines. I wasn't coming after anybody who believes in holistic treatments. I just simply said that I was leaving it up to my baby's liver because that's what livers do. I'm sorry you were ill during your pregnancy. I agree with unhealthy detox for babies or Adults for that matter!! I would never suggest ingesting anything. One poster suggested bentonite clay on feet, it is actually all natural. Probably way safer then some lotions we put on babies lol yes, still not scientifically proven to work. There's no research that says it truly does anything. It's purely anecdotal. Epsom salt isn't going to remove the minimal amount of "toxins and crap" from vaccines. Vaccines are fine, your baby is fine, they don't need to detox in epsom salt. have you researched the benefits of natural holistic minerals like epsom salt, I'd be inclined to agree with you if natural additives like that didn't have many benefits upon absorption by the body and, the toxins and crap that's found in vaccines!!
